$$
\(
      \ce{C6H5-CHO}
      \ce{X=Y#Z}
      \ce{A\sbond B\dbond C\tbond D}
      \ce{A\bond{-}B\bond{=}C\bond{#}D}
      \ce{A\bond{~}B\bond{~-}C}
      \ce{A\bond{~=}B\bond{~--}C\bond{-~-}D}
      \ce{A\bond{...}B\bond{....}C}
      \ce{A\bond{-&gt;}B\bond{-}C}
      \ce{A\bond{unknown}B}
      \)
$$
